messages: 042dd99eb0ff8653814e445ca0093427 (04:36): someone should tell them that multiple backgrounds is about to land for Firefox
042dd99eb0ff8653814e445ca0093427 (04:39): I sort of hate how people assume that Webkit CSS extensions are the future
042dd99eb0ff8653814e445ca0093427 (04:40): hmm, IE8 doesn't support HTML data URLs? FAIL
042dd99eb0ff8653814e445ca0093427 (04:42): Ah, I just want to uncheck "Unofficial" and then I'm happy
a924fb58d2c25874322f4e5126f608b9 (04:43): I wouldn't mind a "hide stuff that isn't ready" checkbox, just to see what little is actually usable
042dd99eb0ff8653814e445ca0093427 (04:46): that page says it supports data URIs for image and stylesheet loads, but not HTML loads
042dd99eb0ff8653814e445ca0093427 (04:47): of course IE also has a ridiculously low URI length limit which cripples data URIs anyway
042dd99eb0ff8653814e445ca0093427 (04:47): it does give the impression they might have done the minimum needed to pass Acid2
47223c0fa41aa7e167a2d1fd2740cbb8 (04:47): 042dd99eb0ff8653814e445ca0093427: it's just a thousand or so character or something iirc

47223c0fa41aa7e167a2d1fd2740cbb8 (04:48): 042dd99eb0ff8653814e445ca0093427: at least it's better than the minimum needed to pass some of the acid3 svg tests -- you just needed the element constructors to exist
47223c0fa41aa7e167a2d1fd2740cbb8 (04:48): 042dd99eb0ff8653814e445ca0093427: they didn't actually need to work
042dd99eb0ff8653814e445ca0093427 (04:49): let's not discuss the deficiencies of Acid3 :-)
47223c0fa41aa7e167a2d1fd2740cbb8 (04:49): 042dd99eb0ff8653814e445ca0093427: wow, i love the idea that Chrome 0.3 is the old chrome, but safari 2 is the old safari
042dd99eb0ff8653814e445ca0093427 (04:50): I also love the idea that IE9 and Firefox 3.2 will be contemporaneous

47223c0fa41aa7e167a2d1fd2740cbb8 (04:52): 042dd99eb0ff8653814e445ca0093427: what makes the chrome 0.3 vs. Safari2 comparison especially hilarious is that chrome's initial release was based on Safari 3.1
47223c0fa41aa7e167a2d1fd2740cbb8 (04:54): or 9f42338e7a000d5d0ee11a9c8880b5ea as the case may be
